# WordCountLibRS
مكتبة لحساب عدد الكلمات في نص. 

## التثبيت
```bash
pip install WordCountLibRS
```

## CMD
```bash
wordcountrs "Hello world from Python"
# Word count: 4 
```

## Python
```python
from word_count_lib import count_words

text = "Hello world from Python"
print(count_words(text))  # 4 
```
